question: Which of the following monomers produce Buna-n polymer?
option1: two parts of butadiene and styrene
option2: four parts of butadiene and one part of isobutylene
option3: two parts of butadiene and one part of acrylonitrile
answer: two parts of butadiene and one part of acrylonitrile
explanation: Buna-n polymer is obtained by copolymerization of two parts of butadiene and one part of acrylonitrile in presence of sodium metal.
